entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
